SELECT t.id as goods_id,t.goods_title as goods_title,t.goods_type_id,t.goods_descript,t.goods_price,t.goods_images, t.goods_nums,t.goods_sales_nums,t.goods_point,t.goods_author,t.goods_publisher,tp.goods_type_name FROM t_b_goods t,t_b_goods_type tp WHERE t.goods_type_id=tp.id
